name: @oxog/querystring
description: High-performance, type-safe query string parser and stringifier with zero dependencies

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:esm: tsc --module esnext --outDir dist/esm --target es2020 && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function renameJsToMjs(dir) { const files=fs.readdirSync(dir); files.forEach(file => { const fullPath=path.join(dir,file); if(fs.statSync(fullPath).isDirectory()) { renameJsToMjs(fullPath); } else if(file.endsWith('.js')) { const mjsPath=fullPath.replace('.js','.mjs'); fs.renameSync(fullPath,mjsPath); } }); } renameJsToMjs('dist/esm'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/index.mjs', fs.readFileSync('dist/esm/index.mjs')); console.log('ESM build complete');"

author: Ersin Koc
